revised_title: Cubic Lattice Green Functions and Elliptic Integrals
tldr: The author proves a basic identity for the complete elliptic integrals K(k+) and K(k-) and uses it to express the face-centered cubic and simple cubic lattice Green functions at the origin in terms of the square of a complete elliptic integral of the first kind. The results are applied to various problems in lattice statistics, including deriving a new simplified formula for the generating function of staircase polygons on a four-dimensional hypercubic lattice.
